com.stockticker.persistence

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOImpl

    public interface UserDAO

    Provides the interface for User related database actions

    Version:
    - 1.0 02/25/2014
    Author:
    - Stuart Connall
    See Also:
    UserDAOImpl, PersistenceServiceException

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User create(String username, String password)
      Create a row in the user table and stores the username and password.
      boolean delete(String username)
      Deletes the user row associated with the username
      boolean exists(String username)
      Checks if the user exists
      User get(String username)
      Gets the user row associated with the user name
      List<String> getLoggedInUsers()
      Returns a list of logged in users.
      int getUserId(String username)
      Gets the userId associated with the specified user name
      boolean isLoggedIn(String username)
      Checks if the user is currently logged in
      boolean setLoginStatus(String username, boolean status)
      Set a user's logged in status to true or false
      boolean update(User user)
      Updates the user data

    • Method Detail

      • getUserId

        int getUserId(String username)
              throws PersistenceServiceException
        Gets the userId associated with the specified user name
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        the user id, -1 otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • create

        User create(String username,
          String password)
            throws PersistenceServiceException
        Create a row in the user table and stores the username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        a new User with id, username, and password, null if creation failed
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • exists

        boolean exists(String username)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Checks if the user exists
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • update

        boolean update(User user)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Updates the user data
        Parameters:
        user - the User object to persist
        Returns:
        true if updated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • get

        User get(String username)
         throws PersistenceServiceException
        Gets the user row associated with the user name
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        a User object or null if it doesn't exist
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • delete

        boolean delete(String username)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Deletes the user row associated with the username
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if delete successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • isLoggedIn

        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if logged in, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • setLoginStatus

                     boolean status)
                       throws PersistenceServiceException
        Set a user's logged in status to true or false

        username - the name of the user
        status - login status, true or false
        Returns:
        true if status set, false otherwise

        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.
